batch_results.title: Policy and Procedures
batch_results.mapping_notes: AC-1 is focused on policy and procedural documentation, which cannot be programmatically checked using boto3 APIs.

batch_results.title: Account Management

new_functions_needed.name: iam_user_account_activity_monitoring
new_functions_needed.rationale: Monitor the use of accounts to ensure compliance with account management requirements.

new_functions_needed.name: iam_user_account_review
new_functions_needed.rationale: Review accounts for compliance with account management requirements.

batch_results.mapping_notes: Existing functions cover some aspects of account management, such as user checks and MFA enforcement, but do not fully address monitoring and review processes.

batch_results.title: Access Enforcement

new_functions_needed.name: iam_policy_access_enforcement_check
new_functions_needed.rationale: Ensure that IAM policies enforce approved authorizations for logical access.

new_functions_needed.name: s3_bucket_policy_access_enforcement_check
new_functions_needed.rationale: Check S3 bucket policies to ensure they enforce approved access controls.

batch_results.mapping_notes: Current functions log and monitor changes to security groups and VPCs, which partially addresses access enforcement. Additional checks on IAM and S3 policies are needed for comprehensive coverage.
